title: Troubleshooting
body_html:
Troubleshooting

Delivery Failures

# Check config
curl -H "X-API-Key: $WEBHOOK_API_KEY" \
  http://localhost:3000/api/v1/webhooks/{id}

# Test endpoint
curl -X POST https://your-endpoint/webhook \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"test":true}'

# Logs
docker logs huly-server | grep webhook

Performance Issues

curl http://localhost:3000/metrics | grep webhook
mongosh --eval "db.webhook_events.find({status:'pending'}).count()"

Configuration

env | grep WEBHOOK
curl http://localhost:3000/api/health | jq '.checks.webhooks'
